Name: short_desc
column6: a brief description of the parameter

Name: extra_desc
column6: additional, more detailed, description of the parameter

Name: context
column6: context required to set the parameter's value (see below)

Name: vartype
column6: parameter type (bool, enum, integer, real, or string)

Name: source
column6: source of the current parameter value

Name: min_val
column6: minimum allowed value of the parameter (null for non-numeric values)

Name: max_val
column6: maximum allowed value of the parameter (null for non-numeric values)

Name: enumvals
column6: allowed values of an enum parameter (null for non-enum values)

Name: boot_val
column6: parameter value assumed at server startup if the parameter is not otherwise set

Name: reset_val
column6: value that reset would reset the parameter to in the current session

Name: sourcefile
column6: configuration file the current value was set in (null for values set from sources other than configuration files, or when examined by a user who is neither a superuser or a member of pg_read_all_settings); helpful when using include directives in configuration files

Name: sourceline
column6: line number within the configuration file the current value was set at (null for values set from sources other than configuration files, or when examined by a user who is neither a superuser or a member of pg_read_all_settings).

Name: pending_restart
column6: true if the value has been changed in the configuration file but needs a restart; or false otherwise.
